ProjectTitle: Nanoparticle synthesis in an ultrasonic flow microreactor for drug delivery applications
InitialFeedbackHistory:
16/12/2024
Documentation/Metadata: metadata is often generated by instruments during analysis, with your SEM for example you mention "device settings are also automatically displayed in the saved pictures". For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven RDM policy asks for 10 years of data preservation: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
Sharing: do you know which repository you will use already? EBI (https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/) or RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr) could be candidates. Repositories will usually ask you to select a license, CC-BY is often used which means others can reuse your data but have to acknowledge you, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/licenses. These repositories will also add a Persistent Identifier upon deposit that you can mention in your publications.
label: good with suggestions
